info.brief_description: Tea gets bigger a bit fatter but definitely sexier and gets some fun time with Yugi
info.description:
It was a whole year since Yugi let Atem the spirit of the puzzle that he found into the spirit world. Having trouble with Joey and Tristan Tea felt lonely sine Yugi had a lot of crap to deal with but one day she notices a strange card like no other. It was a spell card but this card grants wishes limitless and she simply invites Yugi to her house which is owned by her (since her parents were not mentioned at all she would have to live alone) She uses the card which will be known as the wishing fairy throughout the story so when you add be sure to make it Wishing fairy it will do anything she wants but the story is suppose to go with her changing her body to make it sexier and to play around with Yugi. Oh and she can use the card to bring the dark magician girl to life and her own personalty but just use the dark magician girl. She can even brainwash Yugi or change him.
Rules
Just Tea and Yugi and Dark magician girl
no one dies but if that if so please have tea use the wishing fairy to bring it back
If you turn Tea into a shemale as same with dark magician girl just go that far please.
Nothing gay
You can turn Yugi into a girl if wanted or anything else
Tea is allowed to do anything sexual with Yugi anyway
Have fun
